name: GIFSaveOptions
shortdesc: Options for saving a document in GIF format.

property.name: colors
property.shortdesc: The number of colors in palette. Not valid for all palette types.

property.name: ditherAmount
property.shortdesc: The amount of dither. Valid only when 'dither type' is diffusion. Range: 1 to 100.

property.name: forced
property.shortdesc: The type of colors to force into the color palette.

property.name: matte
property.shortdesc: The color to use to fill anti-aliased edges adjacent to transparent areas of the image. Default: white.

property.name: palette
property.shortdesc: The type of palette to use.

property.name: preserveExactColors
property.shortdesc: If true, protects colors in the image that contain entries in the color table from being dithered. Valid only when 'dither' = diffusion.

property.name: transparency
property.shortdesc: If true, preserves transparent ares of the image during GIF conversion.
